level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 113 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1223.01.

level.heading: Resolutions
level.text: Resolution 16-700, the "Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Nonprofit Subsidiary Establishment Approval Resolution of 2006", was approved effective July 7, 2006.
Resolution 16-701, the "Southwest Waterfront Subsidiaries Establishment Approval Resolution of 2006", was approved effective July 7, 2006.
